channel.title: How to make custom weapons give damage
channel.description:
Hi, I've coded servers for some time now, but i'm all new on clients and models etc.
[size=10pt][size=10pt]well my problem is that i dont know how make my custom weapons give damage. :confused:[/size][/size]
i hope this community can help me, you are usually very smart :P

item.title: How to make custom weapons give damage
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

It’s when i fight someone/something ill hit it and “hurt” my opponent

Read full topic
item.source: How to make custom weapons give damage
